channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘Invincible’ Season 4 Brings the War Home in March
item.description: Dinosaurs, dads, and demons all threaten to give Mark a hard time when 'Invincible' returns in two months.

item.title: Deux ans après la création de sa filiale électrique Ampere, Renault fait machine arrière
item.description: C'était une idée intéressante sur le papier : regrouper les activités électrique et logicielle du groupe Renault sous une seule et unique ombrelle, celle d'Ampere. La structure, forte de 11 000 salariés, devait voler de ses propres ailes en Bourse… mais le principe de réalité a été le plus fort. L'entité devrait finalement réintégrer la maison-mère....

item.title: Think AI is just for deepfakes? Adobe reveals a new slate of pro filmmakers using Firefly Foundry to overhaul production workflows
item.description: Lights, camera, prompting with Adobe's new Firefly Foundry suite.

item.title: Sennheiser Is Making Headphone Parties for Your TV a Thing
item.description: This is either the best or worst idea ever.

item.title: Under Armour cyberattack may put over 7 million at risk - but it's staying quiet
item.description: The retailer is yet to confirm, or deny the claims, while Have I Been Pwned? adds millions of new emails to its archive.

item.title: Invincible season 4 trailer reveals new heroes and villains, the start of the Viltrumite War — and a mid-March release date for the hit Prime Video show's next entry
item.description: Amazon has released the official trailer for Invincible season 4 – and confirmed when it'll make its Prime Video debut.

item.title: Why This Weekend’s Winter Storm Is Going to Suck Extra Bad
item.description: A warming Arctic set the stage for a massive winter storm expected to stretch 2,000 miles across the Eastern U.S. this weekend.

item.title: Wix launches 'Harmony' - a hybrid approach to vibe coding and visual design
item.description: Wix Harmony doesn't live in a 'bubble' and won't break the site's code.

item.title: GeForce Now adds support for flight controllers
item.description: It only seems right that cloud gaming should welcome virtual pilots, and that’s definitely now the case if GeForce Now is your streaming platform of choice. One of the most frequently requested features from its community according to NVIDIA, flight control support has now been added to its GeForce Now offering, meaning you can live your Top Gun fantasies without worrying about your rig buckling under the pressure. The first compatible peripheral is the Thrustmaster T.Flight HOTAS One — which incidentally NVIDIA is giving away to five winners of a competition it’s currently running, along with...

item.title: Struggling fusion power company General Fusion to go public via $1B reverse merger
item.description: General Fusion's merger with an acquisition company will net the company over $300 million. Just last year, the company ran into trouble raising money from other investors.

item.title: The best VPN deals: Up to 87 percent off ProtonVPN, Surfshark, ExpressVPN, NordVPN and more
item.description: In a chaotic world, one thing you can count on is your own common-sense steps toward better cybersecurity. Most of the holiday deals are over by now, but plenty of services are still offering excellent prices. With access to a virtual private network (VPN), you can stream TV shows and events from all over the world, protect your information from hackers and thwart online trackers. We strongly recommend using a VPN, but you might get stuck with a substandard app if you jump on the very first deal you see. You might also mistakenly end up paying more than you want to, as even otherwise respectab...

item.title: The First Trailer for ‘Maul—Shadow Lord’ Proves Crime Does Pay
item.description: The new Disney+ animated series shows the ex-Sith still has plenty of evil life left in him.

item.title: Sony announces its first turntables in years
item.description: Sony is releasing a new turntable for the first time since 2019. Two, in fact. The entry-level PS-LX3BT ($399.99) and step-up PS-LX5BT ($499.99) are designed for easy operation with both wired and Bluetooth hi-res audio. Both turntables include one-button automatic playback - which starts the turntable, raises and lowers the tonearm on the vinyl, and […]...

item.title: Telly only had 35,000 TVs in people’s homes last fall
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. When free TV startup Telly came out of stealth in 2023, it did so with big promises: Company executives told the media at the time that Telly would ship 500,000 […]

item.title: Claude Code is suddenly everywhere inside Microsoft
item.description: Developers have been comparing the strengths and weaknesses of Anthropic's Claude Code, Anysphere's Cursor, and Microsoft's GitHub Copilot for months now, looking for a winner. While no individual AI coding tool manages to be the best at every task that software developers do each day, Claude Code is increasingly coming out on top for its […]

item.title: The 5 biggest rumored upgrades coming to your iPhone in iOS 27 – including the long-awaited new Siri
item.description: iOS 27 looks set to be heavily AI-based, but we're also hearing about possible performance and satellite connectivity improvements.

item.title: Sony updates a cult-favorite cheap Bluetooth turntable with not one but two new models – but there's a catch
item.description: Sony's finally updated its fan-favorite PS-LX310BT deck – but the budget-friendly pricing hasn't carried over

item.title: Un trésor cosmique en France : cette météorite contient des grains plus anciens que le Soleil
item.description: Les météorites fascinent, d'abord parce qu'elles viennent de l'espace interplanétaire et qu'il nous est ainsi permis en quelque sorte de le toucher des mains sur Terre, mais aussi parce que nous sommes bien conscients qu'elles nous connectent aux plus vieilles archives de la formation du Système...

item.title: Sony dépoussière le vinyle : ses nouvelles platines s’occupent de tout, même du Bluetooth HD
item.description: Avec les PS-LX3BT et PS-LX5BT, Sony introduit deux platines vinyles sans fil automatiques, pensées pour simplifier l’accès au vinyle tout en proposant une connectivité Bluetooth avancée et une conception soignée.

item.title: Presidents' Day laptop sales 2026: today's best early deals from Dell, Best Buy, and others, plus what to expect
item.description: The President's Day laptop sales are just around the corner now - get ready with our handy guide, which includes great early deals you can shop right now.

item.title: Waymo continues robotaxi ramp up with Miami service now open to public
item.description: Waymo is opening its driverless robotaxis to the public in Miami, starting with a 60-square-mile service area and plans to reach the airport "soon."

item.title: YouTube TV is solving an issue that subscribers have been complaining about for years – this is how it’s lifting its ‘all or nothing’ subscription plans
item.description: YouTube TV is scrapping its Basic Plan for over 10 new specialized subscription tiers, as well as a big upgrade for multiview streaming.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : la 3e démarque démarre fort, voici les offres qui méritent votre argent
item.description: Cela fait déjà deux semaines que les soldes d'hiver ont commencé en France et que les e-commerçants tels qu'Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount partagent des offres. Depuis hier, c'est la 3e démarque et les promotions se multiplient.

item.title: Microsoft shovels more features into Windows 11's Notepad — but isn't it time the company focused on fixing things instead?
item.description: Is this going to irritate a fair few Windows 11 users? You can pretty much bank on that.

item.title: AMD's Ryzen 7 9850X3D CPU will arrive on January 29 and cost $499
item.description: At CES earlier this month, AMD announced the Ryzen 7 9850X3D, a more wallet-friendly take on its $700 9950X3D. The company promised the new chip would be out sometime in the first three months of the year, and it's going to arrive a bit sooner than you might have expected. It can be all yours on January 29 for $499.AMD says the 9850X3D builds on the 9800X3D with an 400MHz upgrade to the boost clock. It can reach boost speeds of 5.6GHz. The Ryzen 7 9850X3D is an 8-core CPU with 16 threads and 104MB of combined L2 and L3 cache. AMD is employing its 3D V-cache tech so it can vertically stack more...

item.title: Ireland proposes new law allowing police to use spyware
item.description: The Irish government announced that it wants to pass a law that would grant police more surveillance powers, such as using spyware to fight serious crime, while aiming to protect the privacy rights of its citizens.

item.title: Why nobody’s stopping Grok
item.description: Today’s episode of Decoder is about X, Grok, and Elon Musk. By now we’re several weeks into one of the worst, most upsetting, and most stupidly irresponsible AI controversies in the short history of generative AI. Grok, the chatbot made by Elon Musk’s xAI, is able to make all manner of AI-generated images, including nonconsensual […]

item.title: Sinners leads 2026 Oscar nominations with record-breaking 16 nods — and it's been joined by a surprise Apple TV movie on the Best Picture shortlist
item.description: The 2026 Oscar nominees list has been revealed — and Sinners' record-breaking haul isn't the biggest talking point for me.

item.title: Bitwarden supercharges credential protection for Premium and Family plans – new update adds vault health alerts, password strength coaching, 5GB secure storage, and phishing protections
item.description: Bitwarden is upgrading protection across Individual and Family plans, but the price is going up too.

item.title: À seulement 162 €, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G (256 Go) est la solution pas chère pour changer de smartphone durant les soldes
item.description: Même si le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G vient d'être remplacé, il reste un bon smartphone milieu de gamme à conseiller. C’est d’autant plus vrai, maintenant qu’il passe de 303 euros à seulement 162 euros à l’occasion des soldes.

item.title: Netflix scores Oscar nominations for Frankenstein and KPop Demon Hunters
item.description: The nominees for the 2026 Academy Awards were just announced and Ryan Coogler's vampire-adjacent period drama Sinners received a record-breaking 16 nominations. That's the highest number of Oscar nominations for a single film in the history of the awards, followed by Titanic, La La Land and All About Eve with 14 noms each. Sinners grabbed a nomination in nearly every major category, including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay. The same goes for the performances, as Michael B. Jordan captured the nomination for Best Actor. Even Delroy Lindo got nominated for Best Supporti...

item.title: This simple, three-step framework is the secret to success under pressure
item.description: What is ‘pause-consider-act’ and how does it work? Leadership loves speed.

item.title: The FBI Has Gained Access to the Washington Post Newsroom
item.description: New court documents claim the feds could access Slack channels, Signal chats, email, and more.

item.title: Waymo is now available in Miami
item.description: Waymo’s fully autonomous robotaxis are now accepting passengers in Miami. The city was one of five named in expansion plans last year, and joins the likes of Phoenix, Los Angeles and the San Francisco Bay Area on Waymo’s existing network. Waymo says that nearly 10,000 Miami residents have signed up so far, and that it will send out invites to new riders on a rolling basis" in the weeks and months to come. The autonomous ride-hailing service will initially cover a 60-square-mile area that includes neighborhoods like the Design District and Wynwood, with Waymo planning to expand to Miami Interna...

item.title: Warren Buffett on the everyday habits that quietly build extraordinary success
item.description: Simple and timeless lessons from Buffett that can reshape how you lead and live. Sometimes Warren Buffett says something so simple, so obvious, that you almost want to roll your eyes. At 95 years young, he has offered plainspoken advice that has shaped one of the most successful careers in history. But when you hear it, you know it’s truth and part of you wonders: Why haven’t I applied this yet?...

item.title: Clubic, Frandroid et Numerama réunis au sein du même groupe
item.description: Il y a des nouvelles qu'on écrit avec un plaisir particulier. Je lis Clubic depuis le collège. C'est là que j'ai, comme beaucoup d'entre vous, appris à aimer la tech. Aujourd'hui, la boucle est bouclée : Clubic rejoint Frandroid et Numerama chez Humanoid. C'est une fierté immense, et je vous explique pourquoi.

item.title: 5 innovations I want from iOS... that'll keep me away from Android
item.description: iOS is a great operating system, but it has the potential to be so much more with the addition of these innovative features.

item.title: Apple gagne une bataille cruciale en France concernant la pub sur iPhone
item.description: Le tribunal judiciaire de Paris a décidé qu'Apple n'avait pas à suspendre son système d'App Tracking Transparency en France. Un dispositif qui lui vaut bien des problèmes en Europe.

item.title: 15 000 € pour remplacer la batterie d’une voiture électrique ? Pourquoi ce scénario catastrophe n’arrive (presque) jamais
item.description: Vous craignez de devoir débourser 15 000 € pour changer la batterie de votre voiture électrique ? Respirez : grâce aux progrès technologiques, les garanties constructeurs et l’émergence d'alternatives économiques, moins de 4 % des propriétaires sont confrontés à ce scénario avant 10 ans d'utilisation.

item.title: Xbox Developer Direct 2026: How to watch and what we expect to see from Fable, Forza Horizon 6 and Beast of Reincarnation
item.description: Xbox is set to hold the fourth installment of its now-annual Developer Direct showcase on January 22. You’ll be able to watch the 2026 edition at 1PM ET on YouTube (including versions with audio descriptions and ASL), Twitch, Facebook and Steam. Xbox will stream the Developer Direct on its regional channels simultaneously, and it’ll be available on Bilibili on Friday. The YouTube stream might be the way to go, since that one will be available in 4K and 60 fps. Because we’re so nice, we’ve embedded that stream above, so all you have to do is click the play button when the time is right.Microsof...

item.title: How to watch 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees online from anywhere – from One Battle After Another to Sinners
item.description: As the annual streamathon arrives ahead of the big night on March 15, here's a full guide to stream all 10 Best Picture Oscar nominees 2026 wherever you are.

item.title: Samsung : voici les 17 bonnes affaires à dénicher à la 3e démarque de soldes
item.description: La 3e démarque des soldes est désormais lancée, avec des offres encore plus alléchantes du côté de Samsung. Smartphones pliables comme le Galaxy Z Flip 7, TV OLED en forte réduction ou encore écrans Ultra Wide OLED : les bonnes affaires se multiplient pour tous les goûts.

item.title: Meilleurs smartphones Samsung Galaxy reconditionné : quel modèle choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Envie d'un téléphone Samsung Galaxy sans pour autant vous ruiner ? Le reconditionné est là ! Mais lequel choisir ? Nous avons sélectionné pour vous différents modèles pour vous aider à savoir quel est le meilleur Samsung reconditionné à acheter selon votre budget.

item.title: The Cast of ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Digs Into Character Relationships
item.description: Peter Claffey, Shaun Thomas, and Tanzyn Crawford talk about Dunk, Raymun, and Tanselle’s connections on the new HBO ‘Game of Thrones’ spin-off.

item.title: Les étranges contradictions de YouTube sur les vidéos « slop IA »
item.description: Le patron de YouTube dit avoir compris que le « slop IA » agace les utilisateurs de la plateforme, mais son annonce sème le doute.

item.title: Google is bringing Personal Intelligence to AI Mode in Google Search
item.description: Google's Personal Intelligence feature can check your Gmail and Google Photos to help provide personalized recommendations in AI Mode.

item.title: Google Search AI Mode can use Gmail and Photos to get to know you
item.description: Google is helping AI Mode to provide more personalized responses in Search by allowing the chatbot to analyze your Gmail and Google Photos accounts. After launching for Gemini AI last week, "Personal Intelligence" is now coming to tailor AI Mode search results to your interests and daily life by gathering information from your emails and […]

item.title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses
item.description: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.

item.title: I've just seen my dream gaming machine: a modder has combined an Xbox Series X, PS5, and Switch 2 into one mega-console, and I only wish I could buy it
item.description: Gamers, here's your dream console, which you could have if Sony, Microsoft, and Nintendo joined hands, but we all know that's never happening.

item.title: AI Mode in Google search can now pull context from your other apps
item.description: After adding Personal Intelligence to Gemini as an opt-in experience, Google has announced that it’s also integrating the feature into AI Mode in Search. What Personal Intelligence does is pull information from your Google apps to tailor its responses based on your history and interests. For Search, in particular, you can allow Personal Intelligence to look for information in your Gmail accounts and Google Photos libraries.If you use AI Mode to shop for clothes with the new feature enabled, for instance, Google could recommend items or models from a brand you previously purchased from. If it s...

item.title: Pantone just made a color matching starter kit for only $99
item.description: Pantone designed a single-fan book of more than 600 colors. Pantone’s professional color matching kits can cost anywhere from several hundred dollars to upwards of several thousand dollars for pros who work in industries like fashion and interiors. Its newest, though, is a single-fan book with more than 600 spot colors, and it’s priced at just $99. Pantone for beginners....

item.title: Claude was down for many – here's everything we know
item.description: If you can't get a conversation going with the popular AI tool, you're not alone.

item.title: This Dreame vacuum is nearly 50% off — shop at Amazon and save $450
item.description: As of Jan. 22, get the Dreame L40s Ultra robot vacuum for 45% off at Amazon, saving you over $450.

item.title: ExpressVPN two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now
item.description:
ExpressVPN is back on sale again, and its two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now. You can get the Advanced tier for $101 for 28 months. This is marked down from the $392 that this time frame normally costs. On a per-month basis, it works out to roughly $3.59 for the promo period. We’ve consistently liked ExpressVPN because it’s fast, easy to use and widely available across a large global server network. In fact, it's our current pick for best premium VPN. One of the biggest drawbacks has always been its high cost, and this deal temporarily solves that issue.
In our review we were...

item.title: I put this high-end OLED TV side-by-side with LG and Samsung's models, and it has two secret weapons that make it my top choice
item.description: While the LG G5 and Samsung S95F may be the more familiar OLED TVs, don't sleep on the Philips OLED910.

item.title: Wicked: For Good receives exactly zero Oscar noms
item.description: 'Wicked' sequel was completely snubbed from the 2026 Academy Awards.

item.title: The U.S. homicide rate is plunging in dozens of cities, including these, data shows
item.description: Little Rock is the only city showing a double-digit increase—by 16%—from 2024. Data collected from 35 American cities showed a 21% decrease in the homicide rate from 2024 to 2025, translating to about 922 fewer homicides last year, according to a new report from the independent Council on Criminal Justice.The report, released on Thursday, tracked 13 crimes and recorded drops last year in 11 of those categories including carjackings, shoplifting, aggravated assaults and others. Drug crimes saw a small increase over last year and sexual assaults stayed even between 2024 and 2025, the study found...

item.title: GitLab patches major security flaw - here's what we know
item.description: A new patch fixes six important flaws, including ones allowing for 2FA bypass.
